description: Product of all numbers formed by permuting the digits of n.
comments: Differs from A062003 at those n which have more than two digits.
prog: (ARIBAS): function permute(s: string): array; var i,k: integer; st1,st2: stack; ele,ws: string; begin stack_push(st2,s[0..0]); for i := 1 to length(s)-1 do while not stack_empty(st2) do stack_push(st1,stack_pop(st2)); end; ele := s[i]; while length(st1) > 0 do ws := stack_pop(st1); for k := 0 to length(ws)-1 do stack_push(st2,concat(ws[0..k-1],ele,ws[k..])); end; stack_push(st2,concat(ws[0..],ele)); end; end; return stack2array(st2); end; function int_permute(n: integer): array; var s: string; ar: array; i: integer; begin s := itoa(n); ar := permute(s); for i := 0 to length(ar)-1 do ar[i] := atoi(ar[i]); end; return ar; end; for k := 0 to 55 do write(product(int_permute(k))," "); end;
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jun 08 2001
